summary: The document is a classified CIA communication to the FBI Director, dated October 7, 1977, discussing information related to Cuban exiles and their activities, including a meeting of the CORU (Coordination of United Revolutionary Organizations) in the Dominican Republic. It mentions individuals such as Rolando Otero Hernandez and details about Cuban exiles in Miami and Santiago, Chile.
key_findings: The document reveals a connection between Cuban exiles in Miami and Santiago, Chile, through Rolando Otero Hernandez.
A CORU meeting was held in the Dominican Republic between June 19 and 21, 1976, attended by several Cuban exiles.
The reliability of the source providing information on the CORU meeting is noted as not established.
